p: Similar to epoxidized plasticizers, polyester plasticizers also serve as an alternative to phthalates because they may migrate from PVC products into human bodies or environment [ 46]. Materials such as long-chain linear polyester, poly(butylenes 2-methylsuccinate) (PBM) and aromatic hyperbranched polyesters (HBPEs) are considered as substitute of phthalates [ 47, 48, 49]. Sunny et al. studied the performances of the PVC cooperated with di-(2-ethyl hexyl) phthalate (DEHP), nitrile rubber (NBR), carboxylated nitrile rubber (XNBR) and epoxidized natural rubber (ENR) [ 50]. The results show that NBR enhanced the stability of the blends. When it comes to food degree PVC, the migration of plasticizers into food raises severe concerns [ 51, 52].
